scripts.config-blockchain: npx rimraf network && npx rimraf tmp && node bin/build-blockchain-configs.js
scripts.start-blockchain: cd quorum-docker/quorum && docker-compose up -d && cd ../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d && cd ../ethAdapter && docker-compose up -d && sleep 20s && curl -I http://172.16.16.16:3000/check
scripts.stop-blockchain: cd quorum-docker/ethAdapter && docker-compose stop && cd ../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml stop && cd ../quorum && docker-compose stop
scripts.down-blockchain: cd quorum-docker/ethAdapter && docker-compose down && cd ../blockchain-explorer && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down && cd ../quorum && docker-compose down
